Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Getting feedback from teachers is good for overall structure and direction of the work while feedback from GenAI is better to dive into details and find small improvement.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Change according to feedback from teachers is more of a mandatory task comparing to feedback from AI where it is totally up to you to follow or not.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: The availability to get feedback is very different. You can just copy and paste your work into AI to get feedback; on the other hand, it takes time and more process to get feedback from school. AKA, getting feedback from AI is easier
